story.title: Story
story.background: 100 years ago, heroes risked their lives to seal the Dragon King. That seal is now beginning to crumble.
story.mission: Dodge the Dragon King's attacks and complete the sealing circuit!

feature1.title: Fantasy Job Experience
feature1.description: You become a Seal Master belonging to the Guild, taking on the Dragon King's sealing operations

feature2.title: Test Your Insight
feature2.description: Decipher complex attack patterns and devise placement strategies

feature3.title: Expanding Strategy
feature3.description: Collect materials from stage clears and create new tools

benefits.title: Perfect for You
benefits.benefit2: Few Controls to Learn, But Requires Thinking
benefits.benefit3: Enjoy a Volume of Gameplay Similar to Famicom
